description:
We are a software development company with one very clear goal - we want each of our clients to be completely satisfied with our work. We are the team of professionals with almost 10 years of global experience specializing in the development of large and medium-sized sites, web applications, portals with complex and rich functionality.
There are more than 20 specialists creating magic in our team, which are:
designers UX/UI
back-end developers
front-end developers
project managers
manual QA
By becoming our client, you get superior consultants, developers, and designers to carry out your project. We highly value our client's time. If you feel that our specialized team can benefit your company, do not hesitate to contact us.
We developed software for 95 challenging projects in USA, Europe, and CIS. Our clients say that we create precisely what they need, not just what they ask.
Tools that we use for development are:
Magento1 and Magento2
PHP, Symfony framework, Zend framework, Laravel framework
JavaScript, React, AngularJS
HTML, CSS, LESS/SASS
MySQL, PgSQL, MongoDB, Solr, Elastic search
Why you should work with us:
Specialized in Symfony/Zend/Laravel frameworks;
Friendly and professional Project Manager
Good QA;
We always complete promises, and sometimes we do more than you expect
We manage all our projects using the world-class software by Atlassian
We follow the world's best methodology SCRUM, Agile, and Kanban in project management. We track developers' activity in a time tracking system.
